summary: gdm bug fix and enhancement update
details:
The GNOME Display Manager (GDM) provides the graphical login screen. The
screen is shown shortly after boot, after log out, and when switching the
current user.

Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):

* "DisallowTCP=false" option is not being used by /etc/gdm/custom.conf file (BZ#2029202)
